navigatecms.privacy_mode: Hide Navigate CMS logo and favicon
navigatecms.display_version: Display Navigate CMS version in status bar
structure.categories.allowed: Categories where the user is allowed to create content (empty means all)
structure.categories.excluded: Categories where the user is NOT allowed to create content (empty means none)
extensions.allowed: Allow running the selected extensions (empty means all)
nvweb.comments.background_color: Define the background color used when composing automatic emails
nvweb.comments.text_color: Define the text color used when composing automatic emails
nvweb.comments.titles_color: Define the titles color used when composing automatic emails
nvweb.contact.background_color: Define the background color used when composing automatic emails
nvweb.contact.text_color: Define the text color used when composing automatic emails
nvweb.contact.titles_color: Define the titles color used when composing automatic emails
